description:
Jahi teaches Doux how to transform and Thaiti tries to find the perfect job.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Maou no Musume ga Imechen Shisugiru!! / ___ wa Pairika no Tenshoku Sugiru!!
The Demon King`s Daughter Is Trying to Change Her Image Too Much!! / XXX Is Too Perfect a Job for a Pairika!!
魔王の娘がイメチェンしすぎる!! / ○△×は誘惑の魔女[パリカー]の天職すぎる!!
